00054 // For Mac OS X < 10.5.
00055 #ifndef NSINTEGER_DEFINED
00056 #define NSINTEGER_DEFINED
00057 #ifdef __LP64__ || NS_BUILD_32_LIKE_64
00058 typedef long           NSInteger;
00059 typedef unsigned long  NSUInteger;
00060 #define NSIntegerMin   LONG_MIN
00061 #define NSIntegerMax   LONG_MAX
00062 #define NSUIntegerMax  ULONG_MAX
00063 #elifdef __APPLE__
00064 typedef int            NSInteger;
00065 typedef unsigned int   NSUInteger;
00066 #define NSIntegerMin   INT_MIN
00067 #define NSIntegerMax   INT_MAX
00068 #define NSUIntegerMax  UINT_MAX
00069 #endif
00070 #endif // NSINTEGER_DEFINED

00072 #ifndef _REGEXKITLITE_H_

00075 #ifdef __OBJC__
00076 
00077 @class NSError;
00078 
00079 // NSError error domains and user info keys.
00080 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexErrorDomain;
00081 
00082 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexErrorNameErrorKey;
00083 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexLineErrorKey;
00084 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexOffsetErrorKey;
00085 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexPreContextErrorKey;
00086 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexPostContextErrorKey;
00087 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexRegexErrorKey;
00088 extern NSString * const RKLICURegexRegexOptionsErrorKey;
00089 
00090 // These must be idential to their ICU regex counterparts. See http://www.icu-project.org/userguide/regexp.html
00091 enum {
00092   RKLNoOptions             = 0,
00093   RKLCaseless              = 2,
00094   RKLComments              = 4,
00095   RKLDotAll                = 32,
00096   RKLMultiline             = 8,
00097   RKLUnicodeWordBoundaries = 256
00098 };
00099 typedef uint32_t RKLRegexOptions;
00100 
00101 @interface NSString (RegexKitLiteAdditions)
00102 
00103 + (void)clearStringCache;
00104 
00105 + (NSInteger)captureCountForRegex:(NSString *)regexString;
00106 + (NSInteger)captureCountForRegex:(NSString *)regexString options:(RKLRegexOptions)options error:(NSError **)error;
00107 
00108 - (BOOL)isMatchedByRegex:(NSString *)regexString;
00109 - (BOOL)isMatchedByRegex:(NSString *)regexString options:(RKLRegexOptions)options inRange:(NSRange)range error:(NSError **)error;
00110 
00111 - (NSRange)rangeOfRegex:(NSString *)regexString;
00112 - (NSRange)rangeOfRegex:(NSString *)regexString capture:(NSInteger)capture;
00113 - (NSRange)rangeOfRegex:(NSString *)regexString inRange:(NSRange)range;
00114 - (NSRange)rangeOfRegex:(NSString *)regexString options:(RKLRegexOptions)options inRange:(NSRange)range capture:(NSInteger)capture error:(NSError **)error;
00115 
00116 - (NSString *)stringByMatching:(NSString *)regexString;
00117 - (NSString *)stringByMatching:(NSString *)regexString capture:(NSInteger)capture;
00118 - (NSString *)stringByMatching:(NSString *)regexString inRange:(NSRange)range;
00119 - (NSString *)stringByMatching:(NSString *)regexString options:(RKLRegexOptions)options inRange:(NSRange)range capture:(NSInteger)capture error:(NSError **)error;
